text: Baluna, ‘ami ki tomaderake esaba bastu theke utkrstatara kono kichura sambada deba? Yara taka'oya abalambana kare tadera jan'ya rayeche jannatasamuha yara padadese nadi prabahita. Sekhane tara sthayi habe. Ara pabitra strigana ebam allah‌ra nikata theke santusti [1]. Ara allah‌ bandadera samparke samyaka drasta
